alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 13 at 2:22AM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Periods of heavy snowfall and strong winds could result in hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and accumulations on roadways across northern Mohave County..
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
